description: A web page for visualizing and interacting with database content, including database and table selection, data display in a table, and interactive elements like refresh and expandable cell content.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Performs fetch requests to retrieve data from specified API endpoints and handles responses.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets the view.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database's table list and loads tables when expanding.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs and injects HTML for displaying table data, including handling wide content and interactive cells.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, including handling nulls, objects, and long strings with expand capability.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for detailed view.
